text: agar is par maaloom ho jae ki vah donon (darog halafee (jhoothee kasam) se) gunaah ke mustahaq ho gae to doosare do aadamee un logon mein se jinaka haq dabaaya gaya hai aur (mayyat) ke jyaada qaraabatadaar hain (unakee taraveed mein) unakee jagah khade ho jaen phir do nae gavaah khuda kee qasam khaen ki pahale do gavaahon kee nisbat hamaaree gavaahee jyaada sachchee hai aur hamane (haq) nahin chhupaaya aur agar aisa kiya ho to us vakt beshak ham zaalim hain
